page.title: 07RATLINGHOPE CHURCH
page.content: The{church}is made out of stone.It has a slate roof.There is a stone {porch}and it too has got a slate roof. The{bell-tower}is made of planks of wood which overlap. The windows have got wire on the outside of them to stop people smashing them. Inside the church the people sit on wooden benches called{pews.}The bottom part of the walls are lined with oak which used to be{box pews. There is a big golden cross at the very end and there is a big old stone font. There is a long gravel path and right by the road is a brand new black wooden sign which says{"ST. MARGARET'S {CHURCH"}and tells you about the church.
